outcome_details: The respondent was ordered to pay spousal support, provide ongoing proof of meeting the separation agreement requirements, and pay costs.
decision_factors: Failure of the respondent to abide by the separation agreement
Five motions required by the applicant
Lack of settlement offer from the respondent
Preparation for and attendance at the uncontested trial
cited_cases: Boucher v. Public Accountants Council for the Province of Ontario (2004), 71 O. R. (3d) (Ont. C.A.)
summary: The respondent failed to comply with a separation agreement, which included spousal support and additional obligations. The court found the respondent aware but noncompliant with proceedings. The respondent was ordered to pay costs of $3,000 and provide spousal support and proof of compliance with the separation agreement.
